title: GONE :Group of Four Scarce St Louis Whites Old Judges
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: GONE :Group of Four Scarce St Louis Whites Old Judges
posts.post_content:
Scarce St Louis Whites Old Judges of Alcott, Crooks, McCormack and Sproat. The Alcott, Crooks and Sproat are nice with clean backs and will grade with a number grade. The McCormack, which is a very scarce pose, is trimmed and rebacked. The image, however, is outstanding. GONE for the group. If interested please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks—Jay
